snippet.title: Ad for Cosmic Ark for the Atari 2600, by Imagic (1982)
snippet.description:
Ad for Cosmic Ark by Imagic for the Atari 2600 video game console. You can read, watch, listen and even play the history of the Atari 2600 at my video game history website The Dot Eaters: http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=console/vcs2600

Or take some great Imagic games for a whirl here: http://thedoteaters.com/?p=12159

In this ad for Cosmic Ark for the Atari VCS, the most fantastical part of the commercial is the two brothers cooperating, instead of them shrieking at each other about who gets to play!

Culled from "Saturday Morning Commercials from 1980-1989", uploaded by Stephen Payne.

Facebook 🕹️ https://www.facebook.com/thedoteaters
Twitter 🕹️  https://twitter.com/doteaters
YouTube 🕹️ https://www.youtube.com/umma6umma
Pinterest 🕹️ https://www.pinterest.com/thedoteaters/

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
